name: VistaProCS
0:
”Alexa, turn off the front yard lights.”
”Alexa, set the pool lights to full brightness.”
”Alexa, increase the back yard lights brightness by twenty percent.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Turn your landscape lighting fixtures on or off, change brightness, and get their current status. Requires at least one VistaPro CS controller connected to Wi-Fi with internet access, and an account set up with the VistaPro CS app.
